Source.Name: cpufrequtils
Source.Summary: Utilities to retrieve cpufreq kernel information.
Source.Description: Library which offers a unified access method for userspace tools and programs to the cpufreq core and drivers in the Linux kernel. This allows for code reduction in userspace tools, a clean implementation of the interaction to the cpufreq core, and support for both the sysfs and proc interfaces.
